headline: MET RAPIST COPPER DAVID CARRICK 🐷🚔💦 DROPPED BALLS 🔴😩 on HISTORIC CHILD ABUSE CLAIMS – Wiltshire Pigs 🐽🚫 FUMBLEd INVESTIGATION like BAD COP MOVIE FLOP 🎥🍆!
text:
